{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=WL-300 |revision= |upc=610839200719 |ean= |asin=B0000A58MC;US; |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=02/21/2002 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point,bridge |fcc_id=MSQWLAPEWL300 |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atmel |cpu1_model=AT76C510 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=512 KiB |fla1_brand=Atmel |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |ram1=512 KiB |ram1_brand=GSI |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atmel |wi1_chip1_model=AT76C510 |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=HFA3861B |wi1_chip3_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip3_model=ISL3685 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn=unknown |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8201L |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=10M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=default |default_ssid_regex=^default$ |default_ip=192.168.39.130 |default_user= |default_pass=asus |oui=00:E0:18 |oui_eth=00:E0:18 }} '''SpaceLink Wireless LAN Access Point'''
{{WPLink|Asus_routers}}
The ''ASUS'' logo and "WL-300 R1.0" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
Per the manual.. :'''RF Output Power''' :*14 ~ 17 dBm (at nominal temperature range) :'''Receiver Sensitivity''' (@ < 8% PER, length = 1024 octets, at nominal temperature range) :*11Mbps: -82 to -85 dBm :*5.5Mbps: -85 to 88 dBm :*2Mbps: -88 to -91 dBm :*1Mbps: -91 to -93 dBm
This device does not seem to have a web configuration interface.
Possible 00:E0:18 OUI...
